author: The Hated One
description:
US government is officially recommending Signal for secure communications. Why and what this means for you?
Support my work: https://www.patreon.com/thehatedone 

The thumbnail contains a fake tweet I made for illustrative and entertainment purposes. It's parodying the Central Intelligence Agency which did not make any recomendation to use Signal. 

This is off-script "breaking news" style of content. Here are some useful sources:

Mobile Communications Best Practice Guidance
https://www.cisa.gov/sites/default/files/2024-12/guidance-mobile-communications-best-practices.pdf

What happened?
U.S. Wiretap Systems Targeted in China-Linked Hack
https://www.wsj.com/tech/cybersecurity/u-s-wiretap-systems-targeted-in-china-linked-hack-327fc63b
Salt Typhoon Hack Shows There's No Security Backdoor That's Only For The "Good Guys"
https://www.eff.org/deeplinks/2024/10/salt-typhoon-hack-shows-theres-no-security-backdoor-thats-only-good-guys
Joint Statement from FBI and CISA on the People's Republi
title: US Government Officially Recommends Signal - What This Means For You
